models.accounts: Each account represents a BingX exchange connection (demo or live) with API credentials that the bot can trade with.
models.systemConfig: Bot state configuration settings that control how the bot operates (currently set via environment variables).
models.systemInfo: Read-only information about the Btcbot system including software versions and uptime metrics.

relationships: One Account is marked as active - this is the account the bot is currently trading with
System Config applies globally to all bot operations regardless of which account is active
System Info is read-only and reflects the current state of the running bot instance
